thread.title: RJB
thread.title_full: White, Jacobs & Associates reviewed by RJB

author: RJB
title: RJB
text: James Lee was my adviser and I truly consider myself lucky for his assistance and guidance over the past several months.. He was responsive to my calls, knowledgeable in how to accomplish my goals and objectives and most of all , "HE DELIVERED on everything he committed to. Never over promised in anyway... Mr. Lee and his firm is one of the few companies that I have dealt over the past several years that had my interest and success as their priority !! Thank you White, Jacobs & Associates for you help.. I would highly recommend this firm to anyone needing the services they provide.. Please ask for James Lee if youre looking for positive results... Regards' RJB
